conversations.content: What significant event was Imam Khamenei addressing on June 25, 2024?
Imam Khamenei was addressing the auspicious occasion of Eid al-Ghadir on June 25, 2024.
Why did Imam Khamenei emphasize the event of Ghadir?
Imam Khamenei emphasized the event of Ghadir because it serves as the foundation for the continuation of Islamic governance and the continuity of the Islamic way of life.
Where did Imam Khamenei deliver his remarks on June 25, 2024?
Imam Khamenei delivered his remarks in the Imam Khomeini Hussainiyah on June 25, 2024.
What upcoming event was mentioned in Imam Khamenei's speech?
The upcoming presidential elections scheduled for Friday, June 28, 2024, were mentioned in Imam Khamenei's speech.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the people-centered nature of the Islamic system?
Imam Khamenei said that the people-centered nature of the Islamic system and belief in the impact of each individual's presence on the fate of the country were learned from Imam Ali (pubh).
How did Imam Khamenei describe the importance of the presidential elections?

Imam Khamenei described the presidential elections as being held 40 days after the loss and funeral of President Raisi, a poignant event that drew millions in heartfelt tribute, and expressed hope that God will grant glory to the Iranian nation in these elections.
What did Imam Khamenei say about national pride in the elections?
Imam Khamenei said that the key to national pride in the elections lies in maximum public participation and the election of the most qualified candidate.
Why is maximum participation in the elections important according to Imam Khamenei?
Maximum participation in the elections is important according to Imam Khamenei because the most important impact of a high turnout is that it brings honor to the Islamic Republic.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the continuation of hostilities against the Islamic Republic?
Imam Khamenei said that the continuation of hostilities against the Islamic Republic from the moment of its formation until now makes elections and high voter turnout factors in overcoming enmities.
What did Imam Khamenei criticize about certain politicians' beliefs?
Imam Khamenei criticized the belief held by certain politicians that progress can only be achieved by relying on foreign powers and the illusion that the US is the only path to development.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Iranian nation's reliance on foreigners?
Imam Khamenei said that the Iranian nation will not permit others to determine its fate in the future and that not relying on foreigners is a demonstration of valor and national independence.
How did Imam Khamenei describe the continuation of Islamic sovereignty?
Imam Khamenei described the continuation of Islamic sovereignty as the continuation of the spirit of Islam, which is manifested in Imamate.
What did Imam Khamenei attribute the continuation of the Islamic way of life to?
Imam Khamenei attributed the continuation of the Islamic way of life to the continuation of Islamic sovereignty through the concept of Imamate and wilayah.
What was the goal of the 250-year-long endeavors and battles of the Imams according to Imam Khamenei?
The goal of the 250-year-long endeavors and battles of the Imams was the sovereignty of Islam, in order to promote the Islamic way of life in society.
What main principles of the Islamic way of life did Imam Khamenei highlight?

Imam Khamenei highlighted the importance of justice, being strict towards disbelievers and showing mercy to fellow Muslims, the ruler's understanding of the people's sufferings and hardships, and the people’s support, obedience, and collaboration with the Islamic leadership.
How did Imam Khamenei describe the virtues of Imam Ali (pbuh)?

Imam Khamenei described the virtues of Imam Ali (pbuh) as possessing unwavering faith that is free from even a trace of despair or doubt, compassion for all individuals regardless of their religion or creed, indescribable justice, and the ability to remain completely vigilant and discern the true intentions of enemies despite their deceptive appearance.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the despair of the disbelievers?

Imam Khamenei attributed the despair of the disbelievers to the continuation of Islam's political sovereignty in the light of God's command to announce the succession and Imamate of Imam Ali (pbuh) by the Holy Prophet (pbuh).
How did Imam Khamenei describe the role of Ghadir in fostering unity among Islamic sects?

Imam Khamenei described Ghadir as serving as the basis for upholding noble Islamic principles and fostering unity among different Islamic sects rather than being a cause of division between Shia and Sunni communities.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Iranian nation's advancement without relying on foreigners?
Imam Khamenei said that the Iranian nation has advanced with the help of God and without relying on foreigners, and it will not permit others to determine its fate in the future either.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the act of not relying on foreigners?

Imam Khamenei said that the act of not relying on foreigners is a demonstration of valor and national independence, which will showcase the Iranian nation's capability, character, and power, and garner further respect on the global stage.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the continuation of the Islamic way of life?
Imam Khamenei said that the continuation of the Islamic way of life is attributed to the continuation of Islamic sovereignty through the concept of Imamate and wilayah.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the goal of the endeavors of the Imams and Shia scholars?

Imam Khamenei said that the goal of the 250-year-long endeavors and battles of the Imams, which some Shia scholars later pursued and continued, and in the present era with the endeavors of Imam Khomeini and the Iranian nation, was the sovereignty of Islam, in order to promote the Islamic way of life in society.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the importance of justice in the Islamic way of life?
Imam Khamenei highlighted the importance of justice as one of the main principles of the Islamic way of life.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the ruler's understanding of the people's sufferings and hardships?
Imam Khamenei highlighted the importance of the ruler's understanding of the people's sufferings and hardships as one of the main principles of the Islamic way of life.
